panels.settings.buttons.filters.name: Name
Send the new message to use for the new addons
Send the new message to use for the updated addons

Avaible variables:
[[name]]: Name of the mod. [[author]]: Name of the creator of the mod. [[authorUrl]]: URL to the mod author's profile. [[versions]]: List of versions supported by the mod. [[modloaders]]: List of modloaders supported by the mod. [[categories]]: List of the mod's categories. [[description]]: Description of the mod. [[created]]: Creation date of the mod. [[modified]]: Edit date of the mod. [[color]]: Color of the mod. [[follows]]: Amount of people who follow the mod. [[downloads]]: Amount of the mod's downloads. [[icon]]: Icon of the mod [[license]]: The license of the mod. [[clientSide]]: Whether the mod is required on the client. [[serverSide]]: Whether the mod is required on the server.
Conditional Variables:
[[?variable:true|false?]] example: [[?name:The name is [[name]]|Missing name?]] Sends "The name is (nome)" if the variable "name" exists, otherwise sends "Missing name". [[?author:The author is [[author]]|?]] Sends "The author is (nome)" if the variable "name" exists, otherwise doesn't.
You updated the message for the new addons
You updated the message for the updated addons
commands.setchannel.messages.success: This chat has been configured for the addons notifications
commands.settings.messages.notConfigured: This chat has not been configured for the addons notifications
commands.settings.messages.success: Settings for the Create addons notifications
commands.start.messages.success:
Welcome! This bot will allow you to receive notification when an addon for the Minecraft mod "Create" gets updated or created.
My commands are:

- /setchannel - Se the channel where to send addon notifications.
- /settings - Manage the settings of the bot.

Made by @Stef_DP and published on GitHub.
commands.preview.messages.notConfigured: This chat has been configured for the addons notifications
commands.preview.messages.invalidArgs: You must specify a message between "new" (new addon) or "update" (updated addon)
